content.detailedDescription:
I was outside when i heard a plane overhead. i looked up just to see how low it was when i noticed a copperish looking ball trailing behind the plane. i would say that it was approx. 50 ft. below and 50 ft. behind this plane almost flying like it was tailing it. i watched it from directly overhead till the plane was out of sight
 this object looked like it was transforming from a ball to cylinder at the front as it was traveling east
content.summary: Following below and behind twin prop plane

content.detailedDescription: i was walking along stratford st. in late 1967 when it began to get light. i looked up and saw a large ship with red,blue and white pulsating lights passing overhead. there was no sound. as i watched it wobbled side to side losing altitude, barely clearing a hill it passed from view then a large flash and crunching sound. as i started to run towards the hill army personnel appeared and kept myself and other witnesses out. the next morning all there that was there was burnt brush and disturbed earth over a large area. until recently i had not felt the urge to share this event.
content.summary: Noticed light increase looked up watched craft wobble over hill large flash then much military

content.detailedDescription: Driving southbound on us 61 heading towards burlington, iowa.Time was about 17:45 cst. looked to the se and noticed a row of about 7 lights all in a line and one light slightly to the left of row seemingly hovering in the distance. seemed the objects were as high as small airplanes, i see many airplanes in my area and always pay attention to the sky and i am for sure this was not an airplane as the lights did not flicker like the wingtip lights. objects than started disappearing one by one, i thought because of cloud cover as it was overcast. it was just getting dark outside and these lights were gold/orange in color. spotted it again in town as i was heading east, now the lights seemed as they were across the river and in illinois. still in a row and still heading se. lost sights of them after passing some buildings and trees. i've seen strange things during the day and at night around this area but this was unquestionably something strange and easy to spot. i also have a friend that can verify that was in illinois at the time and saw the same lights but from a slightly different vantage point.
content.summary: Saw a row of about 7 lights in a straight line.

content.detailedDescription: I witnessed a very blue with white edge sphere of light about midnight. it was about the size of a coffee table. i would say that the inner 90% was a very beautiful light blue and the outside 10% was white. it was a perfect sphere. it was about 75 yards from me. there was no light source in the area. there wasn't any aircraft in the area. it was completely quiet outside.I have never seen or read about anything like what i witnessed. it was going nw and dropped down over my roof towards the ground of a field. about 20 feet above the ground, it banked back up and then banked left. it lasted about 4 total seconds and then it completely disappeared. it was definitely not of this world and my best guess, due to it's size, is that it was some type of probe. this is the first time in my 50 years that i have ever seen anything i could not explain.
content.summary: Orb of light

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was in the backyard testing a night vision monocular yukon ranger that i just bought and i hooked it up to my laptop, i couldn't see the object with the naked eye and it was a clear night, i noticed it watching the screen of my laptop when it was approaching me, when i first saw it i tought "wow hola amigo" and after that the object glowed at me, then when it was flying over me i talk to the object in spanish "hola amigo" and the object reacted slowed down a little and then it glowed at me again or maybe casted some sort of light at me, then the object got smaller as  it was going away,i lose sight of the object because the back wall of my garage was on the way,i didn't notice after a couple of day later when i watch the video on my laptop at the end of the video when the object glowed at me the last time my breathing seemed a little heavy for a few seconds,whatever happened i did notice a change but i won't say here what it is. i don't know what's going on but in less than 2 months i've been able to capture in video around 100 objects in different shapes and sizes, from tear drop shape, triangular delta shape, cigar shape, sphere, etc all of them flying over my house and over me and very low and close.
content.summary: Low flying bright object glowed at me twice like saying hi!!!

content.detailedDescription: I was working in my backyard.  my golden retriever started barking and jumping straight up.  i looked up and, over the high trees in the n/nw corner of the backyard, the nose, then body, of a green triangle came.  the green was the color or the tree leaves (medium light green, not a military green).  it was silent, no visible lights, no windows or other apertures.  the triangle seemed flat.  it flew over my yard and its size was about the size of my yard which is fairly large.  it was not going fast.  in order to just show up like that, it would have had to fly over i-35 and i-69.  both highways are wide open and one can see for quite a distance.  i never heard if anyone else saw the triangle.  my dog continued jumping at it until it disappeared over the house going s/se.  my first reaction was that it was a military vehicle and i waved at it because it was so low.  then as time moved on, i wondered what i'd seen and started looking for any information but could not find anything.  keep in mind this was at about 1:15 p.M. on a sunny day and if my dog hadn't jumped and barked at it, i wouldn't have seen it.  it was that quiet.  (i've seen stealth bombers both on the ground and in flight and this triangle had no flaps etc.  as to the size with re to the stealth, i don't know.  the triangle was large.)
content.summary: Large green triangle

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking towards my home from my university,saw a white light approximate of golf ball thought to be an airliner ready to land. it was stationary for a second and descended rapidly to approximately quarter of its initial height within a second before vanishing into thin air. 

after this i was surprised and intimidated at same time.For the first time in reality i had seen something vanishing into thin air.
content.summary: A white light of disc shape approximate of golf ball

content.detailedDescription:
Cooking on the grill.
twinkle
venus
flashing blue red, then when airplane came from behind me headed toward object it turned orange, then dimmed to only strobes, almost mimicking the plane. it appears to enter the pattern at skyhaven kdaw and then fades to nothing. no sound, 30 min encounter.
have a few videos and pictures if you want them

i will take videos off memory card shortly
content.summary: Though i saw venus rising with blue red twinkle, then turned orange. eventually pulsates, then disappeared towards kdaw.

content.detailedDescription:
I came to visit my parents who were out back looking at the sky through binoculars. i took a look and seen two balls that appeared to be on on fire one larger and brighter than the other.

my mother just happened to look outside and brought it to my attention when i arrived.

i thought it was a plane but looked through bino's and noticed the appearance was nothing like a plane.

object was stationary for about 10 mins than slowly moved out of sight within 10 mins. it appeared to be alternating from larger ball to smaller ball a red and purple light. looked like it was glowing white and red, on  fire.

i didn't believe it could be a ufo when my parents stated it was until i looked thru the bino's. i do believe it was a ufo or at least something i had never seen before.

i lost sight while it slowly moved out of my view.

no pictures were taken because we did not have time to take em but i thought i'd report it anyway.
content.summary: Hovered above seen thru bino's looked like two fire balls one brighter and larger than the other

content.detailedDescription: I was walking to my neighbors house. object caught my eye. took pics with cell phone. got to friends house, called her outside. i began video taping. i thought maybe they were flares, but saw more than 20. you need to see the pics and video. very strange but decent clarity.Objects faded away.
content.summary: You need to see my pics and video

content.detailedDescription:
Ok, well, i was at home, doing dishes, when my roommate comes charging into the kitchen saying  "that ufo i saw is back, go out on the deck!!!" 

 - (she saw the same thing about two years ago while we were hanging out at the creek that runs through our yard, apparently she saw it to the south and much lower in the sky and says it was humming,  i did not see or hear it that time but i had been drinking, and all i remember was her saying "what the f..K, run!"  we ran to/in the house and i asked her what the h..L was wrong? she said "i just saw a craft" she described it to me, and i remember getting an intense feeling of terror, like i was frozen and in slow motion at the same time, sort of like sleep paralysis.  i remember sitting on the floor of the kitchen for an hour, afraid to look up because we have skylights.  i’m assuming i was that terrified because i had been drinking and just sprinted up two acres of yard, because this sort of thing isn't something that would normally cause me to freak like that, i have always believed that were not the only intelligent beings in the universe, but until tonight have never seen a ufo.. other than pictures on google.

anyway, so, she runs in screaming about how this ufo is back, i follow her onto the deck and she is pointing at the sky, i looked up and saw these three stationary orbs in a huge triangle formation (or possibly one big triangle with lights on its tips?) and i immediately started asking myself questions.. are they planes? no, there not moving and not blinking and we live under a flight path near a major airport, so i know what normal commercial jets do and look like,  were also near a military base (where my  roommate works).  is it military? no, they do their stuff to the north, these lights were not in a place they would have been doing anything, especially at 11:30pm on saturday.  where my roommate and i having simultaneous strokes? i doubt it.  is there a gas leak in the house causing hallucinations?  no, its a brand new house with "everything" detectors in every room.   is it flares?  no, i looked through binoculars and they were not flickering, not slowly falling, the formation they were in never changed shape.. they were a solid light reddish yellow, almost gold but not as vibrant if that makes sense?  i took my phone out of my pocket, took about ten pictures and a short video, and then just watched them/it for about 5-8 minutes,  i lined them up in my eyesight with the corner of my house to judge weather or not they where moving,  and honestly believe they were not moving. after 5-8 minutes they just went away in an instant, like just gone, no flash, no burn out or anything i just blinked and they were gone!  i have no idea how long they/it was there before i saw it, my roommate told me about it as soon as she saw it, but how long it was there before either of us saw it.. i do not know.     this all happened at around 11:30pm. 11/8/2014

of the three "orbs"  only two showed up in any of the pictures or video, i have no idea why, the third orb (location shown on one of the pics) was the same size and color as the others but was a bit less bright, i believe the clouds where moving in front of this one?  i could see it perfectly in person.  i  took the pics and video with a galaxy s5 smartphone, so there not exactly professional quality. in the video the orbs appear to flicker.. in person they did not, i think this was just me being shaky while recording and possibly clouds.   also, i don’t remember hearing any humming in person but the video seems to have a very low hum to the audio.. my phone has never had that in videos before and i don’t live near anything that would make that sound, like factories or highways or anything.

i feel like this is waaaay to long and not well written,  that is probably true, since it is now almost 7am.  this is my first ufo sighting and report, and is the last thing i expected to be doing at 7am, so, sorry for that.   i just figured maybe this information could be helpful or interesting in some way.
content.summary: 3 orbs in a stationary triangle formation, possibly one large triangle with orbs on tips?  not moving.

content.detailedDescription:
I took my dog out for a walk, at approximately 2:45 a.M. eastern standard time on the morning of october 27th 2014. i was just about to head home when i looked up and through the trees and noticed that an orange object the size of a star, in the south southeast part of the sky underneath orion's constellation, (to the left of the star sirius near the constellation of canis minor, more specifically in the location of the star procyon).  seeing the object move out of my vision made me a just where i was standing so that the object was above the treeline and not true the tree line from where i only spotted it. i stood in the street with my dog looking south southeast and watched the star like object, which i thought was a star because of its altitude brightness and color.I soon realized that this object was moving, in different shapes & random patterns near & around its original position in the sky.  i thought that i was hallucinating or simply swing and that the star or object wasn't really moving. so i sat down and stared at the object and over the course of about 20 minutes i watched the object move in s like patterns going in small movements then large movements making stops on a dime and changing direction randomly. i even tried to capture the object through my phone's camera and video camera and was unable to focus in on the object enough to satisfy myself. i didn't want to move from where i originally had spotted it because i was distraught with the fact that this is really happening and no one will believe me because i have no proof to show that it really happen. eventually, they paperboy drove into the neighborhood where i was walking my dog, i flag him down and described to him and point out the star or object in the sky which i had seen. he and i stared at the object for approximately 5 minutes and he is well saw exactly the same movements that i was witnessing. 
ultimately, i had to return to my house with my dog at about 3:45 a.M.  i immediately grabbed my digital camera with a telephoto lens and tried to take snapshots of the object but i became very frustrated with not being able to zoom in on the object to my satisfaction. i even tried using my mother's digital camera and my father's tablet to try and take video or photos of the object which was still moving and/or replicating its random patterns in the sky. eventually, i became so frustrated with not being able to harness any evidence to prove or back up what i had seen, that i simply said the hell with it went back inside my house and told my parents what i had seen laid in bed try to get some sleep but i was just too worked up to catch any sleep at all. since the sighting i have seen similar objects in the south south eastern part of the sky but in different spots than the original object sighted, moving in random patterns. i have tried to find out whether or not what i'm witnessing is a common occurrence by researching my sighting on the internet with other people's similar sightings. fortunately i have found some peoples stories to be similar to mine but those stories that i have found similar have all taken place in years past. for some reason i am still seeing the original object in the sky moving and dancing around. if someone could explain or perhaps provide a better video camera with telephoto lens, perhaps my sighting can be proven or explained by a professional.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: It looks like a star, until it started moving in random patterns in the same position it started.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i stepped outside so i could have a cigarette at 12:11am, november 9th. we noticed a bright light in the sky that resembled a very large, bright star. we soon realized it was ascending and descending and hovering. it frequently moved from left to right, up and down unlike any aircraft we've seen. i tried to take video, but my phone could not pick it up. it appeared to pulsate and sometimes seemed to change from red to white lights. it zig-zagged around, and hovered for periods of time. there appeared to be occasional beams of light coming off of it. eventually it traveled away from us and we watched it get smaller. we could still see it as we reentered our house. we wanted to wait for it to disappear, but we were too cold to remain outside for longer. it made us anxious to see what we believed to be a ufo. we were hoping it would dart off, but it continued to hover, just farther away.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: We observed something hovering high in the sky, and watched for over an hour as it frequently changed direction and altitude

content.detailedDescription: I saw a ufo in antioch california on 11/8/2014 at 11:05 pm i went out front toward the east side of my house on the drive strips i went out to have a cigaret like i do every night and was looking to the east then i turned toward the north ans saw a blood red blinking light it was at the bottom of the circle shaped craft it was flying from the west to the east at tree top level 2 blocks from my house it was flying over the highway 4 like it was following the freeway to the east but it had a wobble to it and the light would blink super bright then blink out then back on but dim and had a flickering in the light it would haul ass then stop and hover then take off real slow then stop and hover then it would keep going i watched it till i couldn't see it anymore it didn't have no sound and the lights didn't strobe they fluttered and blinked then once or twice the light turned a reddish orange then back to blood red but i was in my room watching tv and started to feel sick i was fine so i got up went outside for some air then i was feeling worse then i saw the ufo and once it got far enough away i didn't feel sick i felt like i had to throw up i feel that way all the time but this time was different i felt 100x worse my arthritis does bad things to me but i never felt that bad before i almost felt a slight vibrating but the further it got away that feeling and slight vibration went away i know i'm not crazy i see ufos a lot over antioch day and night some people say they saw a cigar shape ufo come out of the delta and take off right towards them then it was gone in no time i don't know whats so special in antioch that ufos are always around we have black diamond mines and mt diablo maybe they have a base in mt diablo and mines the mine shafts go for miles under antioch and pittsburgh and mt diablo that's what i think anyway ill keep filling out reports whenever i see a ufo
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: I saw a blinking light on 11/8/2014 in antioch ca. at 11:05 pm

content.detailedDescription: I was standing by my car at about 10:30am today. when my 9 year old son and i noticed what looked like a flick of geese flying in the sky in between our neighbors homes high up yet low enough to be seen. we stood there for about 5 minutes watching because we started to notice that they weren't doing usual things like a flock of birds would and they seemed to be hovering around the same spot and moved very gracefully. i noticed when the sun hit one that it shined silver and had what looked like darker sides. they stayed in the same area at first point west in a v formation then would turned to point south and as they turned in the sky one would what looked like glide up to the front from one of the sides of the formation. they did not turn like planes. they did not fly like birds. my son stay fixed on the objects and i bent my head and sneezed when i looked back up they were gone disappeared. i asked my son where they went he said mom they just disappeared. i noticed what looked like kind of static on a television or the little white lights tracing across your eyes when you sneeze hard or cough hard in the sky when i was looking for them. i thought it was because i sneezed so i turned to look at the sky behind me to see if i still saw the static like stuff and i did not, however when i turned back to where the objects were i saw it in the sky again there and so did my son. i can't explain it and i'm not a believer in ufos but this was by far the strangest thing i have ever seen and i cannot explain it.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 5 silver shiny objects flying in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Was looking out of my window into the sky when i noticed a brighter than normal light in the sky that seemed to be blinking. at first i thought it may be a plane or helicopter but i decided to have a closer look with my camera. i set up my camera and using a 70/300mm lens with a 2x converter zoomed in on the subject. at first i took video just by hand and observed the orb shaped object. it looked like it was rotating and was constantly changing colour sometimes seeming brighter. i then noticed that the subject appeared to be moving slightly, a little bit up sometimes and down also from side to side. just to make sure that it wasn't myself getting camera shake i then set my camera up on a tripod and recorded more footage.On seeing this object i felt very exited and after my initial thoughts on what it could be came to the conclusion that this sighting is either an electrical storm in the distance or something not of this planet.
content.summary: Thought this was a star at first but seemed to be blinking so got video camera and zoomed in

content.detailedDescription: A triangular  shape glowing green and red came down from the sky by sea world and hovered for about 5 to 6 minutes i was driving so i pulled over and was about to hit record  on my phone when it buzzed or hummed for about 2 seconds  then shot into the sky strain up leaving a green trail behind hind it
content.summary: A triangle of green and red light drifted down slowly pu sated for 5-6 minutes  then shot into the sky

content.detailedDescription: My roommates and i were hanging out on a saturday night watching tv. when i looked into the sky, i saw something that seemed like a star but was showing signs of movement and blinking in a sky with not much cloud cover. i thought it was a star, but as i mentioned it showed signs of movement as well as blinking in a pulsating manner. it exhibited a ring around it which seemed weird for a star as well as it seemed to low in the night sky. the white star like object with a ring around it pulsated as well as it moved slightly up and down as well as it moved left to right as it was hovering. it could be a satellite, but it did not seem like it had a path or trajectory. it felt weird, but i am interested in this subject; so, i was not emotionally affected besides a feeling of befuddlement. i decided to report it to the experts, so i went inside to write this report even if it was a low orbit satellite even though it did not seem to have a trajectory as i have mentioned. well, it was interesting to say the least.
content.summary: White star like object with a white ring around it hovering and moving slightly in the night sky

content.detailedDescription: I got off of work at 5 o'clock and i work off of exist 77. i take route 81 south home towards harrisburg. as usual on friday traffic was going really slow about 15 mph. the sun was setting and starting to get dark outside. i noticed a bright orange glowing streak descending from the sky and then two more. at first i thought from an airplane and the sun reflecting on it but as they came down they all turned and started going straight. then one went up behind a cloud. then the other two were just hovering for about 5 minute then started to go west. i watch them in disbelief. i took out my cell phone and started taking pictures while driving. then all of a sudden they were gone.  it wasn't until i got home and zoom in and saw what appears to be windows on the craft. i'm still in disbelief and thought i would here something about it on the news giving all of the traffic on the highway, but nothing. i'm definitely a believer now. i blew some of the photos up and inverted a couple to show that they solid objects. i just blown away.
content.summary: Three glowing bright orange ufo's over route 81

content.detailedDescription: I got off of work at 5 o'clock and i work off of exist 77. i take route 81 south home towards harrisburg. as usual on friday traffic was going really slow about 15 mph. the sun was setting and starting to get dark outside. i noticed a bright orange glowing streak descending from the sky and then two more. at first i thought from an airplane and the sun reflecting on it but as they came down they all turned and started going straight. then one went up behind a cloud. then the other two were just hovering for about 5 minute then started to go west. i watch them in disbelief. i took out my cell phone and started taking pictures while driving. then all of a sudden they were gone.  it wasn't until i got home and zoom in and saw what appears to be windows on the craft. i'm still in disbelief and thought i would here something about it on the news giving all of the traffic on the highway, but nothing. i'm definitely a believer now. i blew some of the photos up and inverted a couple to show that they solid objects. i just blown away.
content.summary: Three orange glowing ufo's over route 81

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my back porch looking north east smoking a ciggarett and noticed 3 objects flying around one another. i ran inside my house to get my binoculers to get a better view and they remained flying about , like they were chasing each other . i watched these objects (disc shape) for @ least 5 minutes and then all of a sudden they flew off into the atmosphere within seconds.I was thinking it was like watching a cat trying to catch a mouse or squirrels playing.
content.summary: 3 disc objects flying arond one another then took off into the sky

content.detailedDescription: Was standing in backyard talking watching airplane leaving jfk flying east. when bright white/yellow bulb/ teardrop shaped objected entered vision. object streaked from east to west between us and the plane going extremely fast. a guess would be traveling mach 1.5. at around 1,500 feet. this incident occurred in centerport, new york at 8:07 pm on november 8th, 2014.
content.summary: Bright whitish yellow, tear drop or light bulb shape flying horizontal, moving extremely fast

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside and noticed what at first i thought to be a full moon but it was in the north east. it seemed to be larger than a full moon a little hazy/cloudy. i went inside and called my wife and son who came outside. i told them i thought it was a full moon but its in the wrong place. my wife asked what it was and i said i didn't know. i ran in and grab a pair of binoculars, went outside and was looking at it, they went back inside. i noticed it change to an oval, then drift slowly away or possibly down. the it just went out. there was no sound. it was a yellowish color and at first perfectly round. it was probably about 15 to 20 degrees up from the horizon.
it was strange that it stayed the same until i began to look through the binoculars, then started to change or elongate to an oval and started moving away or down then went out. it happened about 7:10pm to 7:15pm and lasted about 5 to 7 minutes.
content.summary: Went outside, saw what i thought was a full moon, but in the north east called wife and son to see

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from leamington after trick-or-treating(our normal route was under construction), when i looked out the car window and saw 2 lights, one was red, and was on the left, and one was white, on the right, hovering over windsor. i viewed it through at least 3/4ths of plymouth road, and for the last second or so i could see it, the lights had changed position. i lost sight of the object when i passed by some trees, and i noticed that the object had disappeared when i could see the position it should've been in. i can only assume that it took a path up, or towards the horizion(either end), when i lost sight of it. also, nothing else was in the area when i spotted it.
content.summary: One large red light and smaller white light seen over windsor, ontario.

content.detailedDescription:
Ok, i did this once before, but the pictures got pulled.

i was in my room, a blackhawk helicopter flew over from the east to the south.  i took three pictures.  it came back a few minutes later, and i took more pictures.  in the last picture, i might have caught the morph.  it didn't look like a helicopter anymore.  please don't pull the pictures off of the internet!!!!  i don't want to have to fill this out again!!!  and i will, if necessary!!!

i will include two pictures.  the first is of the helicopter before the incident, the second is the helicopter after it "changed".  see for yourself, if they don't pull the pictures again!!  i'll even put the second (weird) picture in there again, just to be sure.
content.summary: Blackhawk helicopter changed into an unrecognizable shape

content.detailedDescription: Myself and 2 friends where at a slate mine near kingsbury quebec, i had recently purchased a gopro hero 3 black and wanted to try out it's "slow-motion" capabilities so throughout the day we shot multiple shots of ourself fooling around etc etc. at the end of the day i got home and started looking at the footage, and very rudimentarily slowing it down by bringing down the percentage of the playback speed on my finalcut. in one of the videos with the video at 3% speed i noticed a small blip come out of the horizon  take an abrupt turn and fly away into the distance all in .2 sec (real time) i've cut the video to include this.
content.summary: I was filming in 240fps per second with my gopro and noticed an anomaly in the video when i got back home

content.detailedDescription:
Where were you and what were you doing at the time?

i was in my backyard, sky clear with some air traffic from mccarren airport. i looked east to the sky and observed a bright glowing sphere. it moved slowly in a zig zag pattern and then stopped. it then changed course for a short distance and stopped again for a second or two. i then observed it continue on in a straight pattern heading west until it stopped for another second or two and then began to just move slowly straight up into the sky. i then lost track of it but i did manage to get several photos of it before it disappeared. 

i just looked west and it stood out in the sky cause it was glowing like a star, very brightly. i could tell it wasn't a regular aircraft since i see those all the time and this did not have anything in the way of shapes of a conventional aircraft. it's flight patters was a bit unusual so that also told me it was not commercial aircraft.

i was in shock seeing this mainly because it's during the day in a clear blue sky. it just slowly went straight up into the sky. that's when i lost sight of it. from the distance it was from me i am saying it had to be huge.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Flew in zig zag pattern, stopped then flew again, stopped, the slowly flew along then up.

content.detailedDescription: On the nignt of october,13th, 2014 at 20:45hours or 8:45pm u.S. eastern time zone. i was walking out to my 2006nissan altima at my house on glen road, raymond, maine as i was grabbing work cloths to wash from my car  i noticed a moving light in the sky. at first it was hard to see and then turned off all outside lights off. it was a cloudy night out and the cloud coverage was low. i noticed a half dozen or more fuzzy oval bluish greenish transparent lights moving in a pattern formation in the clouds. they would move very fast some would spin like a ferris wheel and then they would stop suddenly and then change there pattern. the continue for and 1 hour and a half doing 3 or 4 pattern formations. around 21:00 hours or 9:00pm i called 911 dispatch and i was the fourth person to call in reportong the lights. they had cumberland county deputies searching the raymond cape area looking to see where they were coming from. they told me then and again when i followed up the next day that no ground lights caused these lights to appear. at 22:00 hours the lights disappeared just when the clouds started to clear up.I have talked to several neighbors that lived off the cape road in raymond thatnsawmthe lights. i have callex the news three times and they told me they would follow back up with me amd they havent. the cumberland counth sheriffs will only say that they werent ground lights and thats it. i tried calling the maine air national guard in south portland and they wont comment. one more thing while the lights where in the sky i did here a small propellor airplane flying in the clouds heading towards the lights. i couldnt see the plane i could only here it. it flew straight threw and continued on. i know 7 witnesses, but there are more. i tried to fil  the lights but they were to faint to pick up i doo have a 4 second video, but it did make my phone act up and it did the same to two other people that i talked to that witnessed it.
content.summary: I was walking out to grab my work cloths from my car & i noticed a half dozen or more oval loghts that seemed transparent and where bluish green in tbe clouds. the would move in a pattern formation and then stop. it seemed lime some sborrt of signal.

content.detailedDescription:
I was visiting with a friend at my house. we went out to the back yard for a smoke wnd were talking when i noticed a orange light in the sky moving from the eastern sky to the western sky. the light was much brighter than that of a plane and the distance & height seemed to suggest it was moving at a great speed. there were no flashing airplane lights or sound. as we live near a small airport i could tell this wasn't a helicopter or plane. i thought maybe it was a chinese lantern as the light appeared to be fire like & maybe the height was lower than i had thought. the speed of which it traveled convinced me it wasn't. it then took a hard left (south) in the sky and disappeared after a minute. 
we remarked how strange it was and continued our previous conversation. i looked again to the area where it first appeared and a second one was coming. this one appeared almost to be coming right at us. it was even fast than the first and took a slight different flight path. when it too took a hard left and at the point where the light faded i noticed a pyramid shaped group of duller, smaller, white lights travel into it's path and eventually disappear as well.
we again remarked at how strange this all was when a 3rd fireball started to appear from the same eastern point in the sky and make it's travel path similar to the first. i grabbed my cell phone and began filming. when i was done filming my friend noticed a 5th object above us traveling west or north west. it was a duller, faster light that again disappeared into the horizon.
the night was clear, cold & there was a very large moon out casting a large halo in the night sky. 
the events took place within 15 minutes from first sighting to last sighting.
content.summary: 3 seperate fireballs witnessed then 1 triangle of lights then 1 orb

content.detailedDescription:
The event took place friday, november 7th, at approximately 8:15pm cst.  my wife and i were watching tv in the living room.  she decided to go into garage for a cigarette.  the garage door is usually left open till about 9pm or so when we are home unless the weather is bad or its too cold.  we have a table and chairs set up in there so throughout the evening we make occasional trips to the garage for a smoke or a coffee.  our home is in a subdivision about mid block so we have neighbors surrounding us.  the garage faces north.  my wife went into the garage sat down and once noticed unusual lights in the sky.  she got up walked out into the driveway and observed the lights for several seconds.  she then opened the door to the house and popped her head in and called out me to come quickly outside and have a look.  i would say the entire time she went into the garage until she called for me was no longer than 30 seconds.  

the lights were so out of the ordinary that i immediately noticed them.  i observed them for about 15 seconds and then ran inside and got my iphone and ran back out to take video.  at night, our garage is dimly lit.  i use a strand of multicolor christmas lights wrapped around the top of my workbench for illumination.  i keep the overhead garage light off.  being in the garage at night on a regular basis, you get familiar with all the usual lights in the sky.  observing the different types of aircraft in flight are a common occurence. in fact, in the video, you can see a plane moving behind them.  i have never seen anything like them before and they just seemed odd and out of place.  i did not have an idea what the objects were when i first saw them.  i remember asking myself what are they?  then i started mentally going down a checklist as to what they could be.  they were not planes, searchlights, fireworks, fireballs, blimps, or meteors.  i could think of nothing they could have been.  

the objects were cylindrical in shape.  this sounds funny but they resembled and moved somewhat like the slinky toy.  they did not seem to be rigid objects.  they were glowing bright and gold in color.  the movement reminded like an eel swimming under water and at the same time, like a leaf, slowly floating down from a tree.  i remember my wife saying that it looked like they had a tail or that it was leaving behind a trail.  the feeling i had after the event was bewilderment.  i just wanted to know what it was we just witnessed.  as you can see from the video, the objects just seemed to fade out.  i stayed in garage for about another hour or so after they faded out but saw nothing out of the ordinary again.
content.summary: Bright gold cylinders type lights.
